User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Random Eats application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

registrationDate.description: The date and time the user registered.

definition.description: Stores user profile information. Uses path-based ownership for security. Only the authenticated user can read/write to their own document.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user, corresponding to their Firebase Authentication UID.

firestore.reasoning: This Firestore structure focuses on a simple user authentication system using email/password and anonymous authentication. The primary collection is `/users/{userId}`, where each document stores user profile information. Path-based ownership is used, meaning that only the authenticated user can access their own document. This design prioritizes simplicity for the specified authentication requirements, which is the core requirement specified by the prompt.
